product_description: Set out on worldwide adventures and enjoy a high-tech, high-fun, interactive introduction to geography (without leaving home!) with the Talking Globe from Educational Insights. Simply touch the smart stylus pen to the globe to hear over 1000 fun facts and quiz questions that will delight little learners. Pen requires 2 AAA batteries (not included). Continue to explore the outdoors—from the microscopic to the astronomic—with the full GeoSafari line from Educational Insights! Whether you’re looking for a talking microscope, a teaching telescope, or interactive STEM kits and experiments, Educational Insights is your one-stop shop for toys and games that seamlessly blend learning and play! Our award-winning, best-selling products offer endless opportunities: Construct and create with Design & Drill and Playfoam, explore with GeoSafari, or flex your mental muscles with Kanoodle and BrainBolt. With a proud history of working with experts in distinct fields – including scientists, teachers, & artists – we ensure that everyone, from parents to educators and from to children to lifelong learners, can unleash limitless possibilities and passions.
